731853f-a.title: Hospitals - Bellevue Hospital - [The morgue (South).]
731853f-a.text:
Bellevue Hospital: A view showing on the right, the southern side of the Morgue. The building on the left, is No. 479 First Ave., and is located at the N.W. corner of East 28th Street. The foreground would be a continuation eastward, of East 28th Street, if the Hospital grounds permitted. This
is View B.
February 4, 1937.
W.P.A. Photo.
City Wide Project.

731852f-a.title: Hospitals - Bellevue Hospital - [The morgue.]
731852f-a.text:
Bellevue Hospital: A view showing on the right, the southern side of, the Morgue. The building on the left, is No. 479 First Ave., and is located at the N.W. corner of East 28th Street. The foreground would be a continuation eastward, of 28th Street, if the Hospital grounds permitted.
This is View A.
February 4, 1937.
W.P.A. Photo.
City Wide Project.
